m_DescList: Some languages use month-day-year order, while others use year-month-day.
In this globalized era, date formats entered by users reflect their cultural backgrounds. As a humble program, I just want to determine today's actual date!
<color=#666666>Now, deploy your amazing observation skills to program toward the answer (scratch that)</color>
Now, attempt to match the date portion within a text segment

Construct a regular expression that passes all tests on the right.
